languages.text: Спустя долгие часы шаттл Маражая наконец стыкуется к кораблю Вольного Торговца — из всей группы высадки, отправленной к планете, вернулся лишь ксенос, с ног до головы покрытый кровью. Со змеиной самодовольной улыбкой на лице, явно наслаждаясь произошедшим, Маражай вручает Лорд-капитану окровавленный трофей.

traits.locale_text: Спустя долгие часы шаттл Маражая наконец стыкуется к кораблю Вольного Торговца — из всей группы высадки, отправленной к планете, вернулся лишь ксенос, с ног до головы покрытый кровью. Со змеиной, самодовольной улыбкой на лице, явно наслаждаясь произошедшим, Маражай вручает Лорд-капитану окровавленный трофей.

languages.text: After several long hours, Marazhai's shuttle finally docks with the Rogue Trader's voidship. Of the group that was sent to the planet's surface, only the xenos returned, covered in blood from head to toe. With a smug, snake-like smile on his face, having evidently enjoyed what happened, Marazhai hands the Lord Captain a blood-soaked trophy.
languages.original_text: Спустя долгие часы шаттл Маражая наконец стыкуется к кораблю Вольного Торговца — из всей группы высадки, отправленной к планете, вернулся лишь ксенос, с ног до головы покрытый кровью. Со змеиной самодовольной улыбкой на лице, явно наслаждаясь произошедшим, Маражай вручает Лорд-капитану окровавленный трофей.

traits.locale_text: After several long hours Marazhai's shuttle finally docks with the Rogue Trader's voidship. Of the group that was sent to the planet's surface, only the xenos returned, covered in blood from head to toe. With a snake-like smug smile on his face, having evidently enjoyed what happened, Marazhai hands the Lord Captain a blood-soaked trophy.

After several long hours Marazhai's shuttle finally docks with the Rogue Trader's voidship. Of the group that was sent to the planet's surface, only the xenos returned, covered in blood from head to toe. With a snake-like smug smile on his face, having evidently enjoyed what happened, Marazhai hands the Lord Captain a blood-soaked trophy.

After several long hours, Marazhai's shuttle finally docks with the Rogue Trader's voidship. Of the group that was sent to the planet's surface, only the xenos returned, covered in blood from head to toe. With a smug, snake-like smile on his face, having evidently enjoyed what happened, Marazhai hands the Lord Captain a blood-soaked trophy.

After several long hours, Marazhai's shuttle finally docks with the Rogue Trader's voidship. Of the group that was sent to the planet's surface, only the xenos returned, covered in blood from head to toe. With a smug, snake-like smile on his face, having evidently enjoyed what happened, Marazhai hands the Lord Captain a blood-soaked trophy.

After several long hours, Marazhai's shuttle finally docks with the Rogue Trader's voidship. Of the group that was sent to the planet's surface, only the xenos returned, covered in blood from head to toe. With a smug, snake-like smile on his face, having evidently enjoyed what happened, Marazhai hands the Lord Captain a blood-soaked trophy.

languages.text: 漫长的几个小时过去了，玛拉斋的穿梭机终于回到了行商浪人的船上。在所有被派到行星表面的那群人里，只有他活着回来了。他从头到脚都浸满了血，脸上带着毒蛇般的得意微笑，显然很享受这场战斗。他将一件浸透了鲜血的战利品递给了领主舰长。
languages.original_text: After several long hours, Marazhai's shuttle finally docks with the Rogue Trader's voidship. Of the group that was sent to the planet's surface, only the xenos returned, covered in blood from head to toe. With a smug, snake-like smile on his face, having evidently enjoyed what happened, Marazhai hands the Lord Captain a blood-soaked trophy.

traits.locale_text: 漫长的几个小时过去了，玛拉斋的穿梭机终于回到了行商浪人的船上。在所有被派到行星表面的那群人里，只有他活着回来了。他从头到脚都浸满了血，脸上带着毒蛇般的得意微笑，显然很享受这场战斗。他将一件浸透了鲜血的战利品递给了领主舰长。

languages.text: 数時間後、マラズハイのシャトルは、ようやく自由開拓者のヴォイドシップとドッキングした。惑星表面に派遣されたグループのうち、戻ってきたのは異種族だけだった。彼らは頭からつま先まで血まみれだった。マラズハイは、この出来事を楽しんでいるように、蛇のような笑みを浮かべて、血に濡れた戦利品をロード・キャプテンに手渡した。
languages.original_text: After several long hours, Marazhai's shuttle finally docks with the Rogue Trader's voidship. Of the group that was sent to the planet's surface, only the xenos returned, covered in blood from head to toe. With a smug, snake-like smile on his face, having evidently enjoyed what happened, Marazhai hands the Lord Captain a blood-soaked trophy.

traits.locale_text: 数時間後、マラズハイのシャトルは、ようやく自由開拓者のヴォイドシップとドッキングした。惑星表面に派遣されたグループのうち、戻ってきたのは異種族だけだった。彼らは頭からつま先まで血まみれだった。マラズハイは、この出来事を楽しんでいるように、蛇のような笑みを浮かべて、血に濡れた戦利品をロード・キャプテンに手渡した。

languages.text: Tras varias largas horas, la lanzadera de Marazhai atraca por fin con la nave del vacío {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente. Del grupo que fue enviado a la superficie del planeta, sólo regresaron los xenos, cubiertos de sangre de los pies a la cabeza. Con una sonrisa arrogante, como la de una serpiente que ha disfrutado con lo sucedido, Marazhai entrega {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán un trofeo bañado en sangre.
languages.original_text: After several long hours, Marazhai's shuttle finally docks with the Rogue Trader's voidship. Of the group that was sent to the planet's surface, only the xenos returned, covered in blood from head to toe. With a smug, snake-like smile on his face, having evidently enjoyed what happened, Marazhai hands the Lord Captain a blood-soaked trophy.

traits.locale_text: Tras varias largas horas, la lanzadera de Marazhai atraca por fin con la nave del vacío {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente. Del grupo que fue enviado a la superficie del planeta, sólo regresaron los xenos, cubiertos de sangre de los pies a la cabeza. Con una sonrisa arrogante, como la de una serpiente que ha disfrutado con lo sucedido, Marazhai entrega {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán un trofeo bañado en sangre.

languages.text: Nach mehreren langen Stunden dockt Marazhais Shuttle endlich am Raumschiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} an. Von der Gruppe, die auf die Oberfläche des Planeten geschickt wurde, ist nur der Xenos zurückkehrt, von Kopf bis Fuß in Blut gebadet. Marazhai hatte offenbar großen Spaß an dem Geschehen. Mit einem überheblichen, schlangenhaften Grinsen überreicht er dem Lord Captain eine blutgetränkte Trophäe.
languages.original_text: After several long hours, Marazhai's shuttle finally docks with the Rogue Trader's voidship. Of the group that was sent to the planet's surface, only the xenos returned, covered in blood from head to toe. With a smug, snake-like smile on his face, having evidently enjoyed what happened, Marazhai hands the Lord Captain a blood-soaked trophy.

traits.locale_text: Nach mehreren langen Stunden dockt Marazhais Shuttle endlich am Raumschiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} an. Von der Gruppe, die auf die Oberfläche des Planeten geschickt wurde, ist nur der Xenos zurückkehrt, von Kopf bis Fuß in Blut gebadet. Marazhai hatte offenbar großen Spaß an dem Geschehen. Mit einem überheblichen, schlangenhaften Grinsen überreicht er dem Lord Captain eine blutgetränkte Trophäe.

languages.text: De longues heures s'écoulent avant que la navette de Marazhai regagne le vaisseau amiral. De tout le groupe envoyé à la surface de la planète, le xénos, couvert de sang de la tête aux pieds, est le seul rescapé. Avec un sourire arrogant qui n'est pas sans évoquer le rictus d'un serpent, Marazhai, visiblement content de lui, remet {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} un trophée ensanglanté.
languages.original_text: After several long hours, Marazhai's shuttle finally docks with the Rogue Trader's voidship. Of the group that was sent to the planet's surface, only the xenos returned, covered in blood from head to toe. With a smug, snake-like smile on his face, having evidently enjoyed what happened, Marazhai hands the Lord Captain a blood-soaked trophy.

traits.locale_text: De longues heures s'écoulent avant que la navette de Marazhai regagne le vaisseau amiral. De tout le groupe envoyé à la surface de la planète, le xénos, couvert de sang de la tête aux pieds, est le seul rescapé. Avec un sourire arrogant qui n'est pas sans évoquer le rictus d'un serpent, Marazhai, visiblement content de lui, remet {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} un trophée ensanglanté.

languages.text: Geçmek bilmeyen birkaç saatin ardından Marazhai'ın mekiği, nihayet Hür Tacir'in uçsuz gemisine yanaşıyor. Gezegenin yüzeyine gönderilen gruptan yalnızca zeno, tepeden tırnağa kana bulanmış bir vaziyette dönüyor. Yüzünde kendini beğenmiş, sırtlan gülümsemesiyle olanlardan keyif aldığı belli olan Marazhai, Lord Kaptan'a kana bulanmış bir ganimet uzatıyor.
languages.original_text: After several long hours, Marazhai's shuttle finally docks with the Rogue Trader's voidship. Of the group that was sent to the planet's surface, only the xenos returned, covered in blood from head to toe. With a smug, snake-like smile on his face, having evidently enjoyed what happened, Marazhai hands the Lord Captain a blood-soaked trophy.
